Author: dancedancereputation
Text: Got misdiagnosed with MS at 20. After a few years of nerve conduction tests and treatment, they ran a simple blood test and they diagnosed it as something else that was much less sinister. Don't let your doctors scare you, they're smart but human and make mistakes like everyone else. Get a second (or third or fourth) opinion if you need to. Even if it is MS, don't let it take away your life right now, and maybe see a counselor in the meantime? I'm sorry, this is scary and it sucks :( try to be safe

Author: strangernumberone
Text: There's nothing I can say to make this okay. I can't imagine hearing that. I hope you get some news that it's something else that has a brighter outlook. But if not, one of the toughest ladies I've ever known was diagnosed with MS in her early 20s. It's really hard but she still has a fulfilling life. Hoping for the best for you and I'm so sorry you have this possibility to stress over. ‚ù§
